©_copyright_2022_ict_all_rights_reserved: © Copyright {{ year }}. ICT. All Rights Reserved
who_we_are_para1: International Capital Trading (ICT) is a privately owned, progressive leader in real estate development. Rooting its values deeply in the goals of ethical sustainability of Abu Dhabi 2030, ICT aims to enhance the quality and enjoyment of urban living for generations to come. With its established assets and operations throughout the world, ICT has become known for its corporate responsibility.
who_we_are_para2: Unquestionable integrity characterises ICT's business philosophy. Its sound investments contribute to the sustainable progress of the region. Stylish residential hubs, leading tourist and hospitality facilities, convenient office spaces and commercial opportunities have become synonymous with International Capital Trading.
what_we_do_para1: ICT is a leading developer of distinguished properties and a provider of prime real estate management services. Well established in the residential, retail, office and hospitality markets of Abu Dhabi and devoted to the nation's progress and committed to sustainability, ICT embraces qualities of true leadership. ICT is committed to delivering a diverse, sought-after and sustainable urban landscape that helps people make the most of their lives.
what_we_do_para2: From inspiration to innovation and from construction to implementation, ICT's property development is respected for its tradition of quality and commitment to excellence. Its portfolio of iconic landmarks includes a diverse portfolio of residential, commercial, retail and hospitality properties. Its significant retail, office and hospitality facilities contribute to the country's economic goals for a thriving future.
what_we_do_para3: ICT's pioneering mixed-use projects include Nation Towers, United Square, and Cubes Park. Community and residential developments include the ocean-inspired Marasy, Al Aryam and Al Bateen Gardens. ICT's luxury St. Regis and Al Raha Beach hotels make Abu Dhabi a world-class tourist destination.
what_we_do_para4: All of ICT's projects remain in line with the UAE's urban expansion blueprint. The company works closely with governmental entities, including the Department of Urban Planning and Municipalities of Abu Dhabi. The emirate's philosophy of 'Estidama' (the Arabic word for sustainability) grounds ICT's collaborations and is infused into the company culture. You can read more about UPC and Estidama here https://www.upc.gov.ae/en/estidama/estidama-program.
what_we_do_para5: Every responsibly-created ICT project reflects continuous improvement in the company's quest to protect environmental resources, deliver desirable urban developments that benefit the community and, at the same time, preserve Abu Dhabi's timeless culture and traditions.
hospitality_para: ICT has two of Abu Dhabi’s most luxurious hotels in its portfolio: The opulent St. Regis Hotel, within Nation Towers on the Abu Dhabi Corniche and the luxurious Al Raha Hotel, sprawled along a private sandy beach on the Al Raha Corniche.
hospitality_card_title2: The St. Regis Abu Dhabi, Nation Towers
terms_details1: Please read these Terms & Conditions carefully. These are the general Terms and Conditions governing your access and use of this Website (‘Site’).
terms_head1: ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS OF USE
terms_details2: This Website is owned and operated by the International Capital Trading LLC (a term that includes all subsidiaries of International Capital Trading LLC) ('ICT' 'Company', 'we' or 'us'). The following terms and conditions, the lease or sale and purchase agreement ('Property Agreement') entered into with the Company or any of its affiliates pertaining to a commercial lease, unit or plot in an ICT project in respect of which this Web site is used together with any documents they are expressly incorporated by reference (collectively, these 'Terms of Use'), govern your access to and use of www.ICT.ae (the 'Website'), including any content, functionality and services offered on or through the Website whether as a guest or a registered user.
terms_details3: Please read the Terms of Use carefully before you start to use the Website. By using the Website or, where applicable, by clicking on links, you are accepting, or agreeing to, the Terms of Use. When this option is made available to you, you agree to abide by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy, which can be found at www.ict.ae, incorporated herein by reference. If you do not want to agree to these Terms of Use or the Privacy Policy , you must not access or use the Website.
term_head2: CHANGES TO THE TERMS OF USE
terms_details4: ICT may revise and update these Terms of Use from time to time in our sole discretion. All changes are effective immediately when we post them, and apply to all access to and use of the Website thereafter.
terms_details5: Your continued use of the Website following the posting of revised Terms of Use means that you accept and agree to the changes. Check this page from time to time, so you are aware of any changes.
term_head3: ACCESSING THE WEBSITE AND ACCOUNT SECURITY
terms_details6: We reserve the right to withdraw or amend the Website, and any service or material we provide on the Website, in our sole discretion without notice. We will not be liable if for any reason all or any part of the Website is unavailable at any time or for any period. From time to time, we may restrict access to some parts of the Website, or the entire Website, to any user, including registered users.
terms_details8: Making all arrangements necessary for you to have access to the Website.
terms_details9: Ensuring that all persons who access the Website through your internet connection are aware of these Terms of Use and comply with them.
terms_details10: To access the Website or some of the resources it offers, including without limitation, payment using credit cards or other forms of electronic payment, you may be asked to provide certain registration details or other information. It is a condition of your use of the website that all the information, including, without limitation, credit card information or information pertaining to other forms of electronic payments, you provide is correct, current and complete. You agree that all information you provide to register with this Website or otherwise, including but not limited to through the use of any interactive features on the Website, is governed by our Privacy Policy, and you consent to all actions we take with respect to your information consistent with our Privacy Policy.
terms_details11: If you choose, or are provided with, a user name, password or any other piece of information as part of our security procedures, you must treat such information as confidential, and you must not disclose it to any other person or entity. You also acknowledge that your account is personal to you and agree not to provide any other person with access to this Website or portions of it using your user name, password or other security information. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to or use of your user name or password or any other breach of security. You also agree to ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session. You should use particular caution when accessing your account from a public or shared computer so that others are not able to view or record your password or other personal information. You may only have one account with this Website. If you received more than one username, password or activation code, please notify us immediately. Your use of more than one account will represent a breach of these Terms of Use.
terms_details12: We have the right to disable any username, password or other identifier, whether chosen by you or provided by us, at any time in our sole discretion for any or no reason, including if, in our opinion, you have violated any provision of these Terms of Use. To insure secure online payment and all other transactions of personal data, the Website uses a technology called SSL (Secure Socket Layer). SSL encrypts all communications between your computer and our server so that the information can only be read and understood by us. Usually a closed lock on your browser window shows a secure connection. For further information, please consult your browser's security specifications. If your browser is equipped with SSL your transaction will automatically be secured. The common standard in the Internet to signal a secure site is a closed lock at the bottom of the browser. As long as the lock is displayed closed your information is secure and encrypted to avoid abuse. If you click the secure transaction link and still cannot see the closed lock, the reason may be that the window is in nested in another frame.

career_para1: ICT benefits from some of the brightest minds who have powered the company to the forefront of our industry. Without our people, we would be just another real estate company. With our people, we have become the leaders in developing living spaces that uplift and enhance people’s lives
career_para2: Please email your CV, together with a covering letter telling us why you would be a valued member of the ICT team, to Careers@ICT.ae.
career_para3: We will keep your details on record and will be in touch if the right position opens up. Rest assured that all correspondence will be treated with the utmost respect and confidence.
disclaimer_para1: International Capital Trading (ICT) provides this website as a public source of company-related information and material. Under no circumstances will ICT be responsible or liable for any damages of any kind arising out of the use, reference to, or reliance on any information contained within the site.
disclaimer_para2: The information contained within the website is periodically updated, and every reasonable attempt is made to ensure its integrity, however, ICT provides no guarantee that this information is current, correct or complete, and it can accept no liability for inaccuracies.
disclaimer_para3: Use of this website is at the user's own risk. ICT cannot guarantee freedom or protection from destructive codes or harmful viruses.
disclaimer_para4: Downloading of any text, images or video material posted on this website or links through to any third-party website is undertaken at the user's own discretion and sole responsibility.
disclaimer_para5: This website, its content and available services, as well as all public use of the website, are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates.

privacy_policy_para2: This policy describes the type of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the Website www.ICT.ae (our Website) and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting and disclosing that information.
privacy_policy_head1: CHANGES TO THE TERMS OF USE
privacy_policy_head1_para1: ICT may revise and update these Terms of Use from time to time in our sole discretion. All changes are effective immediately when we post them, and apply to all access to and use of the Website thereafter.
privacy_policy_head1_para2: Your continued use of the Website following the posting of revised Terms of Use means that you accept and agree to the changes. Check this page from time to time, so you are aware of any changes.
privacy_policy_head2: THIS POLICY APPLIES TO INFORMATION WE COLLECT:
privacy_policy_head2_para3: · In e-mail, text and other electronic messages between you and this Website;
privacy_policy_head2_para4: · Through any mobile and desktop applications you may download from this Website, which provide dedicated non-browser-based interaction between you and this Website; and,
privacy_policy_head2_para5: · When you interact with our advertising and applications on third-party Websites and services, if those applications or advertising include links to this policy.
privacy_policy_head3: IT DOES NOT APPLY TO INFORMATION COLLECTED BY:
privacy_policy_head3_para1: · Us offline or through any other means, including any other Website operated by any third party; or
privacy_policy_head3_para2: · Any third party, including through any application or content (including advertising) that may link to the Website.
privacy_policy_head3_para3: Please read this policy carefully to understand our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, you can choose not to enter our Website. By accessing or using this Website, you agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time. Your continued use of this Website after we make changes is considered an acceptance of those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.
privacy_policy_head4: INFORMATION WE COLLECT ABOUT YOU AND HOW WE COLLECT IT
privacy_policy_head4_1: WE COLLECT SEVERAL TYPES OF INFORMATION FROM AND ABOUT USERS OF OUR WEBSITE, INCLUDING INFORMATION:
privacy_policy_head4_para1: · By which you may be personally identified, such as your name, postal address, e-mail address, passport number, property ID or telephone number (i.e. your personal information);
privacy_policy_head4_para2: · That is about you, but individually, it does not identify you; and/or,
privacy_policy_head4_para3: · About your internet connection, the equipment you use to access our Website and usage details.
privacy_policy_head5_para1: · Directly from you when you provide it to us;
privacy_policy_head5_para2: · Automatically as you navigate through the site. Information collected automatically may include usage details, IP addresses and information collected through cookies, web beacons and other tracking technologies; and,
privacy_policy_head5_para3: · From third parties, for example, our business partners.
privacy_policy_head6_1: The information we collect on or through our Website may include
privacy_policy_head6_para2: · Records and copies of your correspondence (including e-mail addresses), if you contact us;
privacy_policy_head6_para3: · Your responses to surveys that we might ask you to complete for research purposes;
privacy_policy_head6_para4: · Details of transactions you carry out through our Website and of the fulfillment of your orders. You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order or making payment through our Website; and,
privacy_policy_head6_para5: · Your search queries on the Website.
privacy_policy_head7: USAGE DETAILS, IP ADDRESSES, COOKIES AND OTHER TECHNOLOGIES
privacy_policy_head7_para1: As you navigate through and interact with our Website, we may automatically collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions and patterns, including:
privacy_policy_head7_para2: · Details of your visits to our Website, including traffic data, location data, logs and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Website and,
privacy_policy_head7_para3: Information about your computer and internet connection, including your IP address, operating system and browser type.
privacy_policy_head7_para4: · Details of transactions you carry out through our Website and of the fulfillment of your orders. You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order or making payment through our Website; and,
privacy_policy_head8: THE INFORMATION WE COLLECT AUTOMATICALLY IS STATISTICAL DATA. IT HELPS US TO IMPROVE OUR WEBSITE AND TO DELIVER A BETTER AND MORE PERSONALIZED SERVICE BY ENABLING US TO:
privacy_policy_head8_para1: · Estimate our audience size and usage patterns;
privacy_policy_head8_para2: · Store information about your preferences, allowing us to customize our Website according to your individual interests;
privacy_policy_head8_para4: · Recognize you when you return to our Website.
privacy_policy_head9: THE TECHNOLOGIES WE USE FOR THIS AUTOMATIC DATA COLLECTION MAY INCLUDE:
privacy_policy_head9_para1: Cookies (or browser cookies). A cookie is a small file placed on the hard drive of your computer. You may refuse to accept browser cookies by activating the appropriate setting on your browser. However, if you select this setting you may be unable to access certain parts of our Website. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you direct your browser to our Website.
privacy_policy_head9_para2: Flash Cookies.Certain features of our Website may use local stored objects (or Flash cookies) to collect and store information about your preferences and navigation to, from and on our Website. Flash cookies are not managed by the same browser settings as are used for browser cookies.
privacy_policy_head9_para3: Web Beacons.Pages of the Website and our e-mails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs. pixel tags and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an e-mail and for other related Website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of certain Website content and verifying system and server integrity).
privacy_policy_head10_1: WE USE INFORMATION THAT WE COLLECT ABOUT YOU OR THAT YOU PROVIDE TO US, INCLUDING ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION:
privacy_policy_head10_para1: · To present our Website and its contents to you;
privacy_policy_head10_para2: · To provide you with information or services that you request from us;
privacy_policy_head10_para3: · To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it;
privacy_policy_head10_para4: · To provide you with notices, including expiration, billing and renewal notices;
privacy_policy_head10_para5: · To carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered into between you and us, including for billing and collection;
privacy_policy_head10_para6: · To notify you about changes to our Website or any project or services we offer or provide;
privacy_policy_head10_para7: · To allow you to participate in interactive features on our Website; and,
privacy_policy_head10_para8: · For any other purpose with your consent.
privacy_policy_head10_para9: We may also use your information to contact you about our own and third parties' projects and services that may be of interest to you. If you do not want us to use your information in this way, please contact us at realestate@ICT.ae.
privacy_policy_head11_1: We may disclose aggregated information about our users, and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
privacy_policy_head11_2: We may disclose personal information that we collect or you provide as described in this privacy policy:
privacy_policy_head11_para2: · To contractors, service providers and other third parties we use to support our business;
privacy_policy_head11_para3: · To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution or other sale or transfer of some or all of the Company's assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation or similar proceeding, in which personal information held by the Company about our Website users is among the assets transferred;
privacy_policy_head11_para4: · To fulfill the purpose for which you provide it;
privacy_policy_head11_para5: · For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information; and,
privacy_policy_head12: WE MAY ALSO DISCLOSE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION:
privacy_policy_head12_para1: To comply with any court order, law or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request;
privacy_policy_head12_para2: To enforce or apply our terms of use or terms of sale and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes; and,
privacy_policy_head12_para3: If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety of the Company, our customers or others. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
privacy_policy_head13: CHOICES ABOUT HOW WE USE AND DISCLOSE YOUR INFORMATION
privacy_policy_head13_para1: We strive to provide you with choices regarding the personal information you provide to us. We have created mechanisms to provide you with the following control over your information:
privacy_policy_head13_para2: Tracking Technologies and Advertising.You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when cookies are being sent. If you disable or refuse cookies, please note that some parts of this site may then be inaccessible or not function properly.
privacy_policy_head13_para3: Disclosure of Your Information for Third-Party Advertising. If you do not want us to share your personal information with unaffiliated or non-agent third parties for promotional purposes, you can opt-out by sending us an e-mail stating your request to realestate@ICT.ae.
privacy_policy_head13_para4: Promotional Offers from the Company. If you do not wish to have your e-mail address or contact information used by the Company to promote our own or third parties' projects or services, you can opt-out by sending us an e-mail stating your request to realestate@ICT.ae.
privacy_policy_head14_para1: You can review and change your personal information by logging into the Website e-services. You may also request to update any personal information we hold about you by contacting us at realestate@ICT.ae.
privacy_policy_head15_para1: We have implemented measures designed to secure your personal information from accidental loss and from unauthorized access, use, alteration and disclosure. All information you provide to us is stored on our secure servers behind firewalls. Any payment transactions will be encrypted using SSL technology.
privacy_policy_head15_para2: The safety and security of your information also depends on you. Where we have given you (or where you have chosen) a password for access to certain parts of our Website, you are responsible for keeping this password confidential. We ask you not to share your password with anyone.
privacy_policy_head15_para3: Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we do our best to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of your personal information transmitted to our Website. Any transmission of personal information is at your own risk. We are not responsible for circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the Website.
privacy_policy_head16_para1: It is our policy to post any changes we make to our privacy policy on this page. The date the privacy policy was last revised is identified at the top of the page. You are responsible for periodically visiting our Website and this privacy policy to check for any changes.
privacy_policy_head17_para1: Should you have any questions or comments about this privacy policy and our privacy practices, contact us at realestate@ict.ae.
privacy_policy_para1: CT LLC, which includes all subsidiaries of ICT LLC, (referred to as the 'Company,' 'we' or 'us'), respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy.
privacy_policy_head6_para1: · Information that you provide by filling in forms on our Website. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our Website, subscribing to our service, registering for newsletter, using the 'contact us' form, using the careers page or requesting further services. We may also ask you for information when you enter a contest or promotion sponsored by us, and when you report a problem with our Website
whistle_blowing_head: EXAMPLES OF UNETHICAL AND ILLEGAL CONDUCT ARE:
whistle_blowing_list1: Mismanagement, abuse, waste of ICT’s resources
whistle_blowing_list2: Misstatement of financial records or reports
whistle_blowing_list3: Activities that are not in line with ICT’s Code of Conduct and ICT’s Policies and Procedures
whistle_blowing_list7: Doing business with one's own entity
whistle_blowing_list10: Disclosure or use of confidential information
select_the_items_of_general_allegation: Select the items that best describe the general nature of the allegation
nature_of_allegation2: Fraud, includes knowingly producing or encouraging the production of misleading or inaccurate reports
nature_of_allegation5: Misstatement of financial records or reports
nature_of_allegation9: Waste, includes the inefficient, ineffective, or ruinous use of assets or resources
nature_of_allegation10: Doing business with one's own entity
nature_of_allegation13: Disclosure or use of confidential information
irregularity_first_happen: When did the irregularity first happen?
describe_allegation: Describe the general nature of Allegation (if not found in the above list)
how_incident_address_problem: How did you find out about the incident and when? Any prior efforts to address the problem?
terms_details36: Additional terms and conditions may also apply to specific portions, services or features of the Website. All such additional terms and conditions are hereby incorporated by this reference into these Terms of Use.
terms_details37: Any and all payments made through this Website are subject to these Terms of Use and the Property Agreement. Consequently, the Company is under no obligation to accept any payments not made in accordance with the these Terms of Use or the Property Agreement or made following termination of any of them and you hereby acknowledge and accept that any receipt of payment through this Website or otherwise shall not be deemed or construed as an acceptance of such payment or waiver of right to reject payment at a later date.
terms_details38: Description of Goods and Services: The Website can be used for payment of service fees, utilities and any other charges payable by you for management of the community, compliance with community rules or required by law and in compliance with the Property Agreement.
terms_details39: Currency for all transactions is AED unless stated otherwise
terms_details40: If any transaction is found to be incorrect, unauthorized or fraudulent, payment may be reversed and payments shall remain due. Payment transactions will be processed on the day the transaction is submitted for payment, unless the transaction is submitted on a weekend or non-working weekday where payment will be processed the next working weekday. Upon receiving the funds into our bank account, we should accordingly issue a proper receipt acknowledging the same. All transactions will be processed without delay; however, the Company expressly disclaims any and all liability for processing delays, which may occur in any circumstance. Payment is not accepted (not deemed made) until the funds have been cleared.
terms_details41: and all liability for processing delays, which may occur in any circumstance. Payment is not accepted (not deemed made) until the funds have been cleared.
terms_details42: It is your responsibility to maintain document evidencing payment though the Website.
terms_details43: Any service or maintenance requests made through this Website shall be subject to the Property Agreement.
term_head12: TERMS OF ADVERTISEMENTS OUTSIDE THE UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
terms_details44: All purchases shall be in Arab Emirates Dirhams (AED), regardless if the ads are in other currencies. Please note, due to currency fluctuations the amounts listed on ads in currencies other than AED may be lower or higher at the time of signing the Property Agreement. We recommend contacting our Sales Centre to confirm the purchase price in AED.
terms_details45: Purchases shall be subject to signing a separate Property Agreement with its own terms and conditions. The amounts due under the Property Agreement shall be listed in AED and shall be payable in AED.
term_head13: LINKING TO THE WEBSITE AND SOCIAL MEDIA FEATURES
terms_details46: You may link to any page, provided you do so in a way that is fair and legal and does not damage our reputation or take advantage of it, but you must not establish a link in such a way as to suggest any form of association, approval or endorsement on our part.
terms_details47: This Website may provide certain social media features that enable you to :
terms_details48: Link from your own or certain third-party websites to certain content on this Website.
terms_details49: Send e-mails or other communications with certain content, or links to certain content, on this Website.
terms_details50: Cause limited portions of content on this Website to be displayed or appear to be displayed on your own or certain third-party Websites.
terms_details51: You may use these features solely as they are provided by us, solely with respect to the content they are displayed with and otherwise in accordance with any additional terms and conditions we provide with respect to such features. Subject to the foregoing, you must not:
terms_details52: Establish a link from any Website that is not owned by you.
terms_details53: Otherwise take any action with respect to the materials on this Website that is inconsistent with any other provision of these Terms of Use.
terms_details54: You agree to cooperate with us in causing any unauthorized framing or linking immediately to cease. We reserve the right to withdraw linking permission without notice.
terms_details55: We may disable all or any social media features and any links at any time without notice in our discretion.
